meanings.definition: In a careful or cautious manner.
meanings.sent1: She walked gingerly across the icy sidewalk.
meanings.sent2: He gingerly picked up the fragile vase.
meanings.sent3: The cat gingerly tiptoed around the sleeping dog.
meanings.sent4: The astronaut moved gingerly in zero gravity.
meanings.sent5: The child gingerly touched the hot stove and quickly pulled back.

meanings.sent1: The gingerly approach to the delicate situation paid off.
meanings.sent2: She made a gingerly decision after considering all options.
meanings.sent3: The gingerly driver avoided the potholes on the road.
meanings.sent4: The gingerly crafted sculpture was a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The gingerly chosen words diffused the tension in the room.

meanings.sent1: The ballerina danced gingerly on her toes.
meanings.sent2: He handled the antique clock gingerly to avoid damage.
meanings.sent3: The chef gingerly sprinkled the final touch of seasoning.
meanings.sent4: The spider moved gingerly along its delicate web.
meanings.sent5: She gingerly unfolded the ancient map to reveal its secrets.
